cast.name: 维多利亚·巴德萨拉 Victoria Baldesarra
詹姆斯·普雷斯顿 James Preston
罗伯特·西林帕格利亚 Robert Sciglimpaglia

introduction: Down on his luck creatively and financially Tyler Barnes is contacted out of the blue by his estranged "sister" Madeline who happens to be a professional ballet dancer in the same town as him. After she informs him that she is performing as the lead with her dance troop, she invites him to her recital. Madeline is visually nervous until her enthusiastic, charming and a little off dance instructor Andvari bursts in and helps calm her nerves. She is now ready to perform her part. However there is something about both Andvari and her part, that does not quite meet the eye. After Madeline takes center stage Tyler arrives and he cannot believe what he sees. His life is forever changed.
